Question
========

A researcher has done research and comes up with the following table

  -------- ---- ---- ---- --- Source df SS MS F Groups 4 40 Error 25 Total 29 90 -------- ---- ---- ---- ---

What is the critical limit? This is the limit associated with significance level 0.05 in the F-distribution belonging to the two degrees of freedom in the table.

Solution
========

The correct answer is: 2.76
